course_description: This course is open only to MD/PhD students who are in the medical Foundations curriculum or other regular MD students interested in the MSTP by instructor permission. The course integrates new students into the program, to infiltrate their medical studies with research, scientific, critical and analytical thinking, & to introduce them to clinically relevant fundamental medical science research through reading & presenting papers.
sections: Class Nbr: 4427, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Neish/Quinones, Status: Open
